mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where your every whim turns into gold!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch, demanding a loan for a new yacht because, of course, my current one is so last season. The nerve of the teller to ask me for collateral! I promptly throw a tantrum, declaring that my mere presence in their establishment is worth more than any piece of paper. Within minutes, the bank manager is groveling at my feet, begging me to take out not one, but two loans for the finest yachts money can buy! And that, my friends, is the power of true entitlement.
